name: Google Cloud Functions
description: Cloud computing has made possible fully serverless models of computing where logic can be spun up on-demand in response to events originating from anywhere. Construct applications from bite-sized business logic billed to the nearest 100 milliseconds, only while your code is running. Serve users from zero to planet-scale, all without managing any infrastructure.

apis.name: Google Cloud Functions API
apis.description: Cloud computing has made possible fully serverless models of computing where logic can be spun up on-demand in response to events originating from anywhere
